item.title: 5 Thunderbolts* Cast Members Confirmed For Avengers: Doomsday As Character Death Theories Spike
item.description: The cast for Avengers: Doomsday is slowly being revealed as five confirmed cast members from Thunderbolts* lend credence to character death theories.

item.title: Doomsday Already Has 3 Superhero Teams, And We Don't Know Who The Avengers Are
item.description: Marvel has already confirmed members of at least three superhero teams for Avengers: Doomsday, but an actual line-up for the Avengers is more elusive.

item.title: Wait, Final Destination's Death Is Now A Generational Curse In Bloodlines?
item.description: The first trailer for Final Destination Bloodlines has arrived, and it makes a surprising but interesting reveal about Death and its new plan.
